result.eng: Nixon utterly hated the Kennedy family.
result.ga: bhí an ghráin dhearg ag nixon ar chlann kennedy
result.orig: bhí an ghráin dhearg ag nixon ar chlann kennedy
result.html: bhí an ghráin dhearg ag nixon ar chlann kennedyNixon utterly hated the Kennedy family.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an ġráin ḋearg ag nixon ar ċlann kennedyNixon utterly hated the Kennedy family.

result.eng: They were bringing up a family.
result.ga: bhí siad ag tógáil clainne
result.orig: bhí siad ag tógáil clainne
result.html: bhí siad ag tógáil clainneThey were bringing up a family.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad ag tógáil clainneThey were bringing up a family.

result.eng: How is your family?
result.ga: conas atá do líon tí
result.orig: conas atá do líon tí
result.html: conas atá do líon tíHow is your family?
result.ponchtml: conas atá do líon tíHow is your family?

result.eng: Do you have a special price for a family?
result.ga: an bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlann
result.orig: an bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlann
result.html: an bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlannDo you have a special price for a family?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil praġas speisialta agaiḃ do ċlannDo you have a special price for a family?

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?
result.ga: fan go bhfeice mé - seisear buachaillí agus ceathrar cailíní an bhfuil an ceart agam
result.orig: fan go bhfeice mé - seisear buachaillí agus ceathrar cailíní an bhfuil an ceart agam
result.html: fan go bhfeice mé - seisear buachaillí agus ceathrar cailíní an bhfuil an ceart agam[Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?
result.ponchtml: fan go ḃfeice mé - seisear buaċaillí agus ceaṫrar cailíní an ḃfuil an ceart agam[Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?

result.eng: Julian is the oldest in the family.
result.ga: is é julian an duine is sine sa chlann
result.orig: is é julian an duine is sine sa chlann
result.html: is é julian an duine is sine sa chlannJulian is the oldest in the family.
result.ponchtml: is é julian an duine is sine sa ċlannJulian is the oldest in the family.

result.eng: Eithne is the youngest in the family.
result.ga: is í eithne an duine is óige sa chlann
result.orig: is í eithne an duine is óige sa chlann
result.html: is í eithne an duine is óige sa chlannEithne is the youngest in the family.
result.ponchtml: is í eiṫne an duine is óige sa ċlannEithne is the youngest in the family.

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ga: sin Úna sin niamh ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.orig: sin Úna sin niamh ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.html: sin Úna sin niamh ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireadh[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ponchtml: sin Úna sin niaṁ ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireaḋ[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.

result.eng: I'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.
result.ga: is mise an duine is sine sa chlann
result.orig: is mise an duine is sine sa chlann
result.html: is mise an duine is sine sa chlannI'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.
result.ponchtml: is mise an duine is sine sa ċlannI'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.

result.eng: He particularly hates the royal family.
result.ga: tá col ar leith aige leis an teaghlach ríoga
result.orig: tá col ar leith aige leis an teaghlach ríoga
result.html: tá col ar leith aige leis an teaghlach ríogaHe particularly hates the royal family.
result.ponchtml: tá col ar leiṫ aige leis an teaġlaċ ríogaHe particularly hates the royal family.

result.eng: In place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ga: in áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.orig: in áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.html: in áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ponchtml: in áit na seanċoṁarsan ḃog teaġlaċ nua isteaċ a ḃí i gcónaí ag coṫú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.

result.eng: She abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ga: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.orig: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.html: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: ṫréig sí a tír ḋúċais ar son poist mar ḟeiġlí linḃ le teaġlaċ in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.

result.eng: She would send money to her family at home.
result.ga: chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.orig: chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.html: chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaileShe would send money to her family at home.
result.ponchtml: ċuireaḋ sí airgead ċuig a muintir sa ḃaileShe would send money to her family at home.

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ga: níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.orig: níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.html: níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaighShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ponchtml: níor ligeaḋ di a cuid a iṫe i gcuideaċta an teaġlaiġShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.

result.eng: When he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.
result.ga: nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an fhrainc
result.orig: nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an fhrainc
result.html: nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an fhraincWhen he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.
result.ponchtml: nuair a ḃí sé 11 bliain d'aois ḃog an teaġlaċ go léir go dtí an ḟraincWhen he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.html: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: The family was suffering from poverty.
result.ga: bhí an teaghlach thíos leis an mbochtanas
result.orig: bhí an teaghlach thíos leis an mbochtanas
result.html: bhí an teaghlach thíos leis an mbochtanasThe family was suffering from poverty.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an teaġlaċ ṫíos leis an mboċtanasThe family was suffering from poverty.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: b'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.

result.eng: Her family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ga: bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.orig: bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.html: bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an ḟearg ar ẛiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
